title: Uber and DoorDash delivery workers missed $550 million worth of tips in New York City, a city report estimates
full_text: Uber and DoorDash delivery workers missed $550 million worth of tips in New York City, a city report estimates. The average tip for gig workers at Uber Eats and DoorDash has declined since December 2023, according to an estimate from a New York City department.. Changes to how customers tip on Uber Eats and DoorDash have led to lower earnings for gig workers, according to a report from New York City.Artur Widak/NurPhoto via Getty Images <ul><li>Uber Eats an… [+2896 chars]
